summary: The diff removes the specific WhatsApp “(1)-3” image entry from the Major Projects page gallery list, but there is no evidence the underlying asset file was removed from public assets, nor evidence that all code references to the removed filename(s) were eliminated across the repo. There are also unrelated metadata/state file edits.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the uploaded image "WhatsApp Image 2026-02-16 at 8.58.51 PM (1)-3" from the website so it is no longer displayed anywhere and ensure no broken image references remain, including no remaining code references to "/assets/...-3.jpeg" or "...-3.jpg".
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows removal from the MajorProjectsPage gallery list, but does not provide evidence of a repo-wide removal of all references to the image path(s). Only one page’s image array is shown/edited in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the static asset file for the uploaded image from frontend public assets if it exists and is not referenced elsewhere after REQ-33.
missing_requirements.reason: No asset file deletions are shown (Removed: 0), and no changes indicate the image file was removed from any public/assets directory.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project metadata/state (project_state.json) beyond removing the specified image/asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrains changes to removing the specific image and now-unused asset(s); updating project_state.json appears unrelated to that requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt (repository documentation/summary) beyond removing the specified image/asset.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to update summary/documentation files; this appears to be extra change not required for image removal.
